detail_desc: Cardigan in a soft rib knit with hole-knit sections at the front. V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Side pockets, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Side pockets, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Long, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover with a concealed button at the front, and a V-neck at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, pleats at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Long, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover with a concealed button at the front, and a V-neck at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, pleats at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with an embroidered motif at the top and long sleeves. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with an embroidered motif at the top and long sleeves. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Playsuit in woven fabric with decorative lace trims and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, smocking at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Unlined.
